title: Possibility to set keyboard language with code
body:
I need a posibility to set the keyboard language from code.
E.g. the focus on TextBox1 opens the keyboard with the german layout, the focus on TextBox2 opens the keyboard with a greek layout.

comments.body: I have a WPF app for a kiosk environment so need to be able to switch language of the interface and keyboard during runtime.

I totally agree. I have friends from different countries, always switching the keyboard manually from english to french or spanish is really ennoying, even more when you talk to two persons at the same time!
